notImplemented.title: PERT Maker > Not Implemented Feature
notImplemented.text:
This functionality doesn't exist yet and will be
available in a later version of the software.

exportImage.title: PERT Maker > Export
exportImage.text: An error occurred during the process !
exportImage.informativeText: Make sure your graph fits in your field of view.

refreshConnectionView.title: PERT Maker > Refresh Connection View
refreshConnectionView.text: An error occurred during the process !
refreshConnectionView.informativeText:
This could be due to empty connections or
a loop that shouldn't exist.

generateMinMaxTime.title: PERT Maker > Generate Min and Max Times
generateMinMaxTime.text: An error occurred during the process !
generateMinMaxTime.informativeText:
This could be due to empty connections or
a loop that shouldn't exist.
generateMinMaxTime.label:
The loop limit has been reached during the process,
exceeding %s loops. Probably an infinite loop.

Loops Remaining (1): %s
Loops Remaining (2): %s

generateCriticalPath.title: PERT Maker > Generate Critical Path
generateCriticalPath.text: An error occurred during the process !
generateCriticalPath.informativeText:
This could be due to empty connections or
a loop that shouldn't exist.
generateCriticalPath.label:
The loop limit has been reached during the process,
exceeding %s loops. Probably an infinite loop.

exportTable.title: PERT Maker > Export > Table
exportTable.informativeText: Can't export a table that doesn't exist.

exportImage.title: PERT Maker > Export > Image
exportImage.informativeText: Can't export a graph that doesn't exist.

settingsReload.title: PERT Maker > Settings
settingsReload.text:
A restart of the software is necessary in order
to correctly apply all the settings.
